task_prompt: 在打开的浏览器中，去哔哩哔哩观看数码宝贝，并将进度条拉到中间
send_prompt:
您对 Linux 操作系统非常熟悉。您的任务是操作计算机屏幕，完成指定的任务。
您现在的目标是操作计算机屏幕，视频宽度：1024，视频高度：768，总体目标是 "在打开的浏览器中，去哔哩哔哩观看数码宝贝，并将进度条拉到中间"。

我们为这个总体目标制定了一个实施计划：

    1. 在浏览器地址栏输入哔哩哔哩网站的URL“www.bilibili.com”

    2. 按下回车键以导航到哔哩哔哩网站

    3. 在哔哩哔哩网站上的搜索框中输入“数码宝贝”

    4. 点击搜索按钮以执行搜索

    5. 在搜索结果中找到相关的数码宝贝视频并点击打开

    6. 将进度条拉到中间


现在的子任务是 "在浏览器地址栏输入哔哩哔哩网站的URL“www.bilibili.com”"。
您可以使用鼠标和键盘，可选择的操作有：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```
其中，鼠标的位置是相对于屏幕左上角的坐标，键盘的按键请参考 [keysymdef.h]。

请输出执行动作，请以 json 格式输出您的动作，例如：
我的计划是点击左下角的开始按钮，因此我的操作将是：
```json 
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":10,"height":760}}
]
```

另一个例子，我的计划是打开记事本，我看到屏幕上有Mousepad，因此我的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Super_L"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_text":"notepad"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Return"}
]
```


现在的子任务是 "在浏览器地址栏输入哔哩哔哩网站的URL“www.bilibili.com”"，请根据现有屏幕图像的状态给出详细的下一步操作。
LLM_response:
根据提供的屏幕截图，我们可以看到Mozilla Firefox浏览器已经打开，且地址栏呈现并高亮显示。此时，您需要在地址栏输入哔哩哔哩的网址。以下是完成这个子任务的一系列操作步骤：

1. 使用鼠标点击地址栏，确保地址栏处于激活状态，可以输入文本。
2. 输入哔哩哔哩的网址 "www.bilibili.com"。

由于地址栏已经高亮显示，我们可以省略点击地址栏的步骤，直接进行文本输入。这是因为在大多数现代浏览器中，一旦打开新标签页，地址栏会自动选中，允许立即输入。现在，我们可以直接通过键盘输入来实现这一操作：

```json
[
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "www.bilibili.com"}
]
```

如果地址栏未被激活或者需要确认点击地址栏，可以使用以下操作：

```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","
LLM_response_editer:
根据提供的屏幕截图，我们可以看到Mozilla Firefox浏览器已经打开，且地址栏呈现并高亮显示。此时，您需要在地址栏输入哔哩哔哩的网址。以下是完成这个子任务的一系列操作步骤：

1. 输入哔哩哔哩的网址 "www.bilibili.com"。

由于地址栏已经高亮显示，我们进行文本输入。这是因为在大多数现代浏览器中，一旦打开新标签页，地址栏会自动选中，允许立即输入。现在，我们可以直接通过键盘输入来实现这一操作：

```json
[
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "www.bilibili.com"}
]
```
task_prompt_en: In the open browser, go to Bilibili to watch the digital baby, and pull the progress bar to the middle
task_prompt_zh: 在打开的浏览器中，去哔哩哔哩观看数码宝贝，并将进度条拉到中间
send_prompt_en:
You are familiar with the Linux operating system. Your task is to operate the computer screen and complete the specified task.
Your current goal is to operate the computer screen. The video width is 1024 and the video height is 768. The overall goal is "to watch the digital baby in the open browser and pull the progress bar to the middle".
We have formulated an implementation plan for this overall goal:
1. Enter the URL of Bilibili website "www.bilibili.com" in the browser address bar
2. Press the Enter key to navigate to the Bilibili website
3. Enter "Digital Baby" in the search box on the Bilibili website
4. Click the Search button to perform the search
5. Find the relevant digital baby video in the search results and click Open
6. Pull the progress bar to the middle
The current subtask is "Enter the URL of Bilibili website" www.bilibili.com "in the browser address bar".
You can use the mouse and keyboard. The operations you can select are:```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```The position of the mouse is the coordinate relative to the upper left corner of the screen. For keyboard keys, see [keysymdef. h].
Please output the execution action. Please output your action in json format, for example:
My plan is to click the Start button at the bottom left corner, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 10, "height": 760}}
]
```Another example, my plan is to open notepad. I see Mousepad on the screen, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Super_L"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "notepad"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```The current subtask is "Enter the URL of Bilibili website" www.bilibili.com "in the browser address bar. Please give the detailed next step according to the status of the existing screen image.

LLM_response_editer_en:
According to the screenshot provided, we can see that the Mozilla Firefox browser has been opened, and the address bar is displayed and highlighted. At this time, you need to enter the URL of Bilibili in the address bar. The following is a series of steps to complete this subtask:
1. Enter the website of Bilibili "www.bilibili.com".
Since the address bar is highlighted, we enter text. This is because in most modern browsers, once a new tab is opened, the address bar is automatically selected, allowing immediate input. Now, we can implement this operation directly through keyboard input:```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "www.bilibili.com"}
]
```

1. 输入哔哩哔哩的网址 "www.bilibili.com"。
